head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CAMPBELL, VIRGINIA L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CAMPBELL, VIRGINIA L.

block.p: CAMPBELL-Virginia L. Of Chatham, NJ on August 7, 2000. Beloved sister of Ruth Bowden of Chatham. Loving aunt to Frank Bowden, Margaret Bowden and Virginia Kopelman. A Funeral Mass will be held at St. Patricks RC Church, Chatham, New Jersey, on Saturday, August 12, 2000 at 9:00 A.M. Friends may call at Wm. A Bradley & Son Funeral Home, Friday from 2-4PM and 7-9PM. For further information go to www.bradleyfuneralhome.com
